item.title: Molly Gordon joins the cast of ‘THE BEAR’ Season 2.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
The poster for Eva Longoria’s ‘FLAMIN’ HOT’ has been released.
The film debuts on Hulu and Disney+ on June 9, 2023.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Jonathan Groff has joined the cast of the upcoming season of ‘DOCTOR WHO’ in a key role.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Brendan Fraser confirms he is in Martin Scorsese’s ‘KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON’ following online speculation that his role has been cut.
(https://people.com/movies/brendan-fraser-says-hes-really-being-picky-with-future-roles-after-his-oscar-win/?utm_campaign=peoplemagazine&utm_content=new&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter.com&utm_term=64552263f925b10001065734…)

item.title:
Brendan Fraser says he hasn’t signed on to any new projects following his Oscar win: “At the moment, I don't have anything — I'm really being picky right now.”
(https://people.com/movies/brendan-fraser-says-hes-really-being-picky-with-future-roles-after-his-oscar-win/?utm_campaign=peoplemagazine&utm_content=new&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter.com&utm_term=64552263f925b10001065734…)
